other_tests.findings: Polycythemia was confirmed by blood volume measurements using the Cr51 radioisotope technique, and a polycythemia vera was ruled out.
Right pheochromocytoma (3.5 cm) at age 45, and two abdominal paragangliomas (4 cm) at age 59.
Identified somatic HIF2A mutations (c.1586T /H11022C; p.Leu529Pro in patient 1 and c.1625T /H11022C; p.Leu542Pro in patient 2).
